mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NUMBER, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_DATE, P.POST_UPDATE, P.POST_LINK, P.JOURNALIST, P.MEMBER_NUMBER, P.TEAM_NUMBER, P.ADMIN_NUMBER, P.POST_TYPE FROM TBL_POST P WHERE P.POST_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT P.POST_NUMBER, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_DATE, P.POST_UPDATE, P.POST_LINK, P.JOURNALIST, P.MEMBER_NUMBER, P.TEAM_NUMBER, P.ADMIN_NUMBER, P.POST_TYPE FROM TBL_POST P WHERE P.POST_NUMBER = #{postNumber}

SELECT C.COMMENT_NUMBER, C.MEMBER_NUMBER, C.POST_NUMBER, C.COMMENT_CONTENT, C.COMMENT_DATE, C.COMMENT_UPDATE, M.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_COMMENT C JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE C.POST_NUMBER = #{postNumber} ORDER BY C.COMMENT_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST(POST_NUMBER, MEMBER_NUMBER, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_DATE, post_type) VALUES (SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL, #{memberNumber}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, SYSDATE, 1)
